items.markText: You can't get away from yourself by moving from one place to another. There's nothing to that.‚Äù
It is awfully easy to be hard-boiled about everything in the daytime, but at night it is another thing.
‚ÄúDon't you ever get the feeling that all your life is going by and you're not taking advantage of it? Do you realize you've lived nearly half the time you have to live already? ‚Äù
Nobody ever lives their life all the way up except bull-fighters.‚Äù
live by the sword shall perish by the sword.
her chin lifting and her face hardening
she led him quite a life.
Not drunk in any positive sense but just enough to be careless.

items.markText: ‚ÄúYou're an expatriate. You've lost touch with the soil. You get precious. Fake European standards have ruined you. You drink yourself to death. You become obsessed by sex. You spend all your time talking, not working. You are an expatriate, see? You hang around caf√©s.‚Äù

items.markText: You're only a case of arrested development.‚Äù
All countries look just like the moving pictures
I suppose she only wanted what she couldn't have.
made a few passes at her face as she looked in the little mirror
She was looking into my eyes with that way she had of looking that made you wonder whether she really saw out of her own eyes.
including the one that certain injuries or imperfections are a subject of merriment while remaining quite serious for the person possessing them.
Her eyes had different depths, sometimes they seemed perfectly flat. Now you could see all the way into them.

Enjoying living was learning to get your money's worth and knowing when you had it.
it is because I have lived very much that now I can enjoy everything so well.
Our stay on earth is not for long. Let us rejoice and believe and give thanks.‚Äù

items.markText: Everything is on such a clear financial basis in France. It is the simplest country to live in. No one makes things complicated by becoming your friend for any obscure reason. If you want people to like you you have only to spend a little money.
Send a girl off with one man. Introduce her to another to go off with him. Now go and bring her back. And sign the wire with love.
They give you a feeling that the world would be destroyed, would actually be destroyed before your eyes, if you said certain things.
the sun had not yet dried the dew

items.markText: I lay awake thinking and my mind jumping around.
He was all teeth and lips.
I could picture it. I have a rotten habit of picturing the bedroom scenes of my friends.
I had the feeling as in a nightmare of it all being something repeated, something I had been through and that now I must go through again.
Why I felt that impulse to devil him I do not know. Of course I do know. I was blind, unforgivingly jealous of what had happened to him.
Road to hell paved with unbought stuffed dogs.
Braddocks was his literary friend. I was his tennis friend.
but I held him off it

don't ask me a lot of fool questions if you don't like the answers.
